Deeply saddened by the refusal of my GOP colleagues to recognize the threat posed by the president’s misconduct. No president should ever be allowed to invite foreign interference in our elections, no Congress should ever tolerate obstruction.

Glad to see the House pass robust appropriations measures to fund the government, and to support key progressive priorities. We’re raising pay for federal workers, repealing Cadillac healthcare taxes and investing millions to research & combat gun violence. 1/2
President Trump will be held accountable. The facts are clear. We are defending the constitution.

H.R.3 will let the federal government fight to deliver lower drug prices for every American. For years, hardworking families have paid more and more while big pharma’s profits increase through the roof. We took decisive action—the Senate must follow!

The House has passed hundreds of bills. Mitch McConnell continues to block countless vital priorities, including 276 pieces of bipartisan legislation. Enough obstruction—he must do his job and help us deliver for the American people!

HR 3 will lower drug prices for millions of Americans. The federal government can negotiate fair prices and hold big pharma accountable. We can cap out-of-pocket expenses and prevent sudden unfair price spikes. Its time to #LowerDrugCosts now! I was proud to pass it this week.
The president used the power of his office to force Ukraine to attack a political rival. He violated the constitution to try to cover up his crimes. To safeguard our democracy, he must be impeached.

Deeply proud of my colleagues on the Judiciary Committee who approved the articles of impeachment that will hold President Trump accountable for abuse of power and obstruction of congress. I look forward to voting on the floor of the house.

#WeAreStillIn no matter what the federal government decides to do. U.S. coalitions committed to the Paris Climate Agreement now represent nearly 70% of U.S. GDP and nearly 65% of the U.S. population. #COP25

No one should have to choose between paying their bills and the cost of their prescription drugs. We’re taking bold action to cut prices and hold drug companies accountable. We can’t wait. The president and Mitch McConnell can’t keep obstructing!

Four years ago, we signed the Paris Climate Accord. We can’t abandon our global leadership or our responsibility to fight to limit carbon emissions. We’re #StillIn and committed to upholding the agreement here in Congress.

President Trump abused his power. He used the federal government to try to force a foreign government to interfere in our election, and only backed off when he was caught in the act. He obstructed constitutional investigations into his crimes. We will hold him accountable.

Congress needs to restore sanity and oversight to our foreign policy. And, we need to ensure our national security while balancing military spending with critical priorities here at home. I cannot support a defense authorization act that does not advance these goals  4/4

We saw President Trump’s reckless behavior in Syria. He has repeatedly shown willingness to undermine our national security by diverting military resources to a border wall.  And he continues to support the appalling and counterproductive Saudi war in Yemen.  3/4

I also can’t support a bill that continues to irresponsibly increase the amount we spend on our military programs. And, I certainly cannot support a bill that supports the terrible foreign policy decisions of this administration. 2/4
